subject: Re: [junit] Re: Mock and collections.
msgSnippet: ... I look forward to reading it! The explanations will help me understand. ... You re welcome. I m glad I could help. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger ::
messageBody:
Luiz Siqueira wrote:
>
>
> Ok, I found a easy solution for my problem, Even the code becomes more clear
> with this new approach. Soon I will send to you the new code. I will make a
> article about this too.

I look forward to reading it! The explanations will help me understand.

> Thanks. :)

You're welcome. I'm glad I could help.
